client_description_Summary_Note:
Janssen Schipper Snijders and the RM met at a networking event in Amsterdam. They quickly realized they had complementary skills and decided to collaborate on several projects.
Janssen Schipper Snijders is a 26 year old and comes from Netherlands.
Looking for a private bank with a deep understanding of wealth management, he joined Julius Baer for its expertise.
client_description_Family_Background: Janssen Schipper Snijders is currently single. He does not have any children.
client_description_Education_Background:
In 2017, Janssen graduated from Openbaar Lyceum Hengelo with a secondary school diploma.
He then attended University of Amsterdam, which he graduated in 2023.
client_description_Occupation_History:
Janssen Schipper Snijders is a 26 year old and comes from Netherlands.
In 2023, Janssen Schipper Snijders started working as a Drilling Engineer at NAM (Nederlandse Aardolie Maatschappij) B.V., marking the beginning of his successful career.
client_description_Wealth_Summary:
While working, he saved 10000 EUR, which he used to build a diversified investment portfolio.
Client does not have any properties.He inherited 2570000 EUR from his grandmother, a well-known Venture Capitalist, in 2018, allowing him to expand his investment portfolio.
client_description_Client_Summary: In summary, Janssen has demonstrated a strong work ethic and financial acumen, positioning them well for the future.
